title: #461: Snape's Secrets (OOTP 24, Occlumency)
description:
• Quizzitch Live: The Fandom of Secrets was a huge success! Keep an eye for our next hangout!
  • Rupert Grint is going to be a DAD!
  • Muggle Mail covers a random Lockhart encounter and when J.K. Rowling actually revealed Dumbledore's sexuality (see J.K. Rowling: A Year in the Life)
  • Chapter-by-Chapter continues with Order of the Phoenix – Chapter 24: Occlumency
  • 7-Word Summary: Harry’s journey back into his mind fails 
  • Snape vs. Sirius
  • A grim goodbye! Should we have known then?
  • What's the deal with The Knight Bus? Can't they "magic" a smoother ride?
  • Cho and Harry: he picks up on what's she putting down relatively quickly for a teenage boy! See you on Valentine's Day!
  • Nagini and The Department of Mysteries: Snape gives Harry the information Dumbledore and the Order of the Phoenix have refused to!
  • What in the world is Dumbledore thinking letting Snape penetrate Harry's mind?
  • Why doesn't Harry get the opportunity to remove memories he doesn't want Snape to see?
  • Would Harry fair better if he actually listened to Snape's instructions?
  • Could Occlumency be considered a form of rape?
  • Snape reveals a big truth about himself when describing Legilimency, but it goes over Harry's head!
  • What does Voldemort know about Harry at this point in the story? Does he know he's a Horcrux? If so, why the strong desire to kill him?
  • Does Dumbledore not consider the vulnerable position mentally and physically these lessons put Harry in? 
  • Why does Snape not like the use of Voldemort's name?
  • The Umbridge Suck Count climbs to 52!
  • The hosts give their MVP of the Week and Rename The Chapter!
  • Quizzitch: What does Hagrid instruct Harry to put on the salamanders?
  • This week's episode is brought to you by Wondery's Imagined Life, and OpenFit (Start working out at home! Just text MuggleCast to 50-50-50 to get started)!
  • Join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including Bonus MuggleCast! This week, we discuss the difference between Snape and Queenie and their ability to "read people's minds"!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
